document.full_text: privately held toy retailer toys r us  has canceled a $1.1 billion loan deal that was intended to refinance its debt and reduce borrowing costs, bloomberg reported on monday.
document.title: toys r us cancels $1.1 billion loan deal: report
lines_and_colors: privately held toy retailer toys r us  has canceled a $1.1 billion loan deal that was intended to refinance its debt and reduce borrowing costs, bloomberg reported on monday.
